Package org.jsfml.graphics

Class Image

java.lang.Object
org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.core.SFMLNativeObject
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.graphics.Image
public class Image extends SFMLNativeObject
Provides methods for loading, manipulating and saving images.

  • Nested Class Summary

    static class 
    Image.PixelOutOfBoundsException
    Thrown if a non-existing pixel is being accessed by either getPixel(int, int) or setPixel(int, int, Color).

    • create

      public void create(int width, int height, Color color)
      Generates a new image and fills it with a color.
      Parameters:
      width - the image's width.
      height - the image's height.
      color - the fill color of the image.

    • create

      public final void create(int width, int height)
      Generates a new image and fills it with black.
      Parameters:
      width - the image's width.
      height - the image's height.

    • create

      public void create(BufferedImage image)
      Creates a new image by converting an AWT BufferedImage.
      Parameters:
      image - the AWT buffered image to convert.

    • create

      public void create(int width, int height, int[] pixels)
      Creates a new image from the given pixel data.

      The pixel data is expected to be in the BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_ARGB color format.

      Parameters:
      width - the image's width.
      height - the image's height.
      pixels - the image's pixel data in 32-bit ARGB format.

    • loadFromStream

      public void loadFromStream(InputStream in) throws IOException
      Fully loads all available bytes from an InputStream and attempts to load the image from it.
      Parameters:
      in - the input stream to read from.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case an I/O error occurs.

    • loadFromFile

      public void loadFromFile(Path path) throws IOException
      Attempts to load an image from a file.
      Parameters:
      path - the file to load the texture from.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case an I/O error occurs.

    • saveToFile

      public void saveToFile(Path path) throws IOException
      Attempts to save the image to a file.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file to write.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case an I/O error occurs.

    • getSize

      public Vector2i getSize()
      Gets the size of the image.
      Returns:
      the size of the image.

    • createMaskFromColor

      public void createMaskFromColor(Color color, int alpha)
      Creates a transparency mask from the given color.
      Parameters:
      color - the color to be made transparent.
      alpha - the alpha value to assign to pixels matching the color key.

    • createMaskFromColor

      public final void createMaskFromColor(Color color)
      Creates a transparency mask from the given color, making matching pixels fully transparent.
      Parameters:
      color - the color to be made transparent.

    • copy

      public void copy(Image source, int destX, int destY, IntRect sourceRect, boolean applyAlpha)
      Copies a portion of another image onto this image.
      Parameters:
      source - the source image.
      destX - the destination X coordinate.
      destY - the destination X coordinate.
      sourceRect - the source rectangle. An empty rectangle means the full image.
      applyAlpha - true to copy alpha values as well, false to leave the destination alpha.

    • copy

      public final void copy(Image source, int destX, int destY, IntRect sourceRect)
      Copies a portion of another image onto this image.
      Parameters:
      source - the source image.
      destX - the destination X coordinate.
      destY - the destination X coordinate.
      sourceRect - the source rectangle. An empty rectangle means the full image.

    • copy

      public final void copy(Image source, int destX, int destY)
      Copies another image onto this image.
      Parameters:
      source - the source image.
      destX - the destination X coordinate.
      destY - the destination X coordinate.

    • setPixel

      public void setPixel(int x, int y, Color color)
      Sets the color of a certain pixel.
      Parameters:
      x - the pixel's X coordinate.
      y - the pixel's Y coordinate.
      color - the color to apply to the pixel.

    • getPixel

      public Color getPixel(int x, int y)
      Gets the color of a certain pixel.
      Parameters:
      x - the pixel's X coordinate.
      y - the pixel's Y coordinate.
      Returns:
      the pixel's color.

    • getPixels

      public int[] getPixels()
      Retrieves a copy of all the pixels of the image in 32-bit ARGB color format.

      The retrieved image data is compatible to the BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_ARGB color format.

      Returns:
      a copy of all the pixels of the image in 32-bit ARGB color format.

    • toBufferedImage

      public BufferedImage toBufferedImage()
      Converts this image to an AWT BufferedImage.

      The resulting buffered image will be of BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_ARGB color format.

      Returns:
      the resulting buffered image.

    • flipHorizontally

      public void flipHorizontally()
      Flips the image horizontally.

    • flipVertically

      public void flipVertically()
      Flips the image vertically.
